column2: JBR-1337: add logs on JavaFX init errors, prevent stuck IDE

column3: This PR is a proof-of-concept that:
Please advise if a different kind of notification for the user would be appropriate.
I was unable to build the complete IDE locally, but I tested the code as part of the AsciiDoc plugin including the "stuck" detection.
Thank you for the contribution. However, the original cause of the deadlock was fixed right in JavaFX we ship with our JBR 11. Please find it here: JetBrains/jdk8u_jfx@0fcd66f
